fields.name: Chicago Cubs
fields.description: Celebrate your Chicago Cubs fandom with this jersey! This stylish jersey will have you sporting your Chicago Cubs pride comfortably around town. Whether you're running like you're stealing a base or practicing your swing at the cages, this jersey will let everyone know that you are a devoted Chicago Cubs fan.

fields.name: San Francisco Giants
fields.description: Even though Will Clark isn't out there putting on a show for the San Francisco Giants anymore, his impact on the franchise will never be forgotten. Show your respect for one of the game's all-time greats with this Cooperstown Collection Player jersey from Nike.
